data.name: Monster Girl Dormitory
data.detailed_description:
Plot summary

The monster girls were sealed in the monster girl's hut by a powerful magician, and the items that unlocked the seal were kept in the room for a long time. The hero needs to find the items according to the clues to lift the seal.

How to play

Move the mouse over the monster girl and a prompt will appear. Follow the prompts to find the item to unlock the seal, put the item on the monster girl to release the seal, lift the monster girl and put it into the magic circle to get a picture related to the monster girl.

Game content

The game contains 5 cute characters and 5 beautiful pictures.

data.short_description: “Monster Girl Dormitory”is a decryption game, find items according to the hints on the character to complete the decryption.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
